info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 27 at 8:57PM PDT until July 27 at 10:30PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR NORTHEASTERN CLARK COUNTY... At 857 PM PDT, Heavy rainfall earlier across the Moapa and Overton Basins totaled between 0.25 inches and 1.5 inches and excessive runoff remains possible. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Moapa Town, Overton, Moapa Valley, Logandale, Sr 168 Mile Marker 21, Coyote Springs and Overton Beach. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
